ideogram_character_seed: Oliver is a 7-year-old boy with messy blonde hair and blue eyes. He wears a green t-shirt, brown shorts, and hiking boots. He carries a wooden walking stick and has a determined, serious expression. Protective of his sister, wary but appreciative of gentle nature.

exact_colors.details: forest green t-shirt, earthy brown shorts, dark brown hiking boots

facial_structure.mouth: small mouth with a determined, serious expression

consistency_formula: 7-year-old boy with messy blonde hair, sky blue eyes, green t-shirt, brown shorts, hiking boots, wooden walking stick, serious expression
visual_style_notes: The art style should be colorful and engaging, with a focus on Oliver's protective and determined nature. His serious expression should be balanced with a sense of adventure and curiosity.
